name: Sal, The
text:
Well hi! Welcome to The Sal, or Salsbury Grill as it was once known. We’re a laid back little eatery that’s been serving Westfort and Thunder Bay now for 56 years. So get comfy and enjoy yourself. Thanks for coming by, and welcome to the cult.
Snack
Sal fave Mozza Sticks $15.5
Bacon Jal Pops $14.5
Bang Bang Chicken $16
Crab Rangoons $17
Share
Gluten free Sweet Potatoes $14
Onion Rings $14
LG Fries n Gravy $11
Waffle Fries$14
Poutine
Chicken n Waffle$17
Sal faveBuffalo Chicken$17
Pickle Party$17
Classic$14
Sal fave – Sal fave Kinda hot – It’s kinda hot Gluten Free – Can be made gluten free Available vegetarian – Available Vegetarian
Burgers
Burgers! 4.5oz patties made in house on Roma Bakery kaiser’s
Served with choice of fries, mash, salad, or soup.
Add coleslaw or gravy to any meal for $1.75.
Classic burg $15.5/$16.5/$18.5
regular / cheeseburger / bacon cheese – mayo, lettuce, tomato, pickle
Sal faveSalburger $20
grilled ham, cheddar, mozza, grilled onions, mayo, lettuce, tomato, pickle
The Final Boss $21
bold bbq, bacon, swiss, waffle fries, crispy banana peppers, garlic aioli, lettuce, tomato, pickle
tacos
The one and only! Or two, or four?
single $8 / one + side $13 / two + side $19 / four $24
Served with your choice of fries, mash, salad, or soup.
Add coleslaw or gravy to any meal for $1.75.
Sal fave Crispy Fish / Grilled Chicken / Chorizolegendary choice! – chipotle aioli, cheese, cabbage, fresh pico de gallo
Bang Bang Shrimpgrilled shrimp, cheese, cabbage, house made sauce, cucumber, carrot, cilantro, chili flake
Korean BBQ Chickenbbq, crispy chicken, cheese, cabbage, pickled onion, cilantro, sesame seeds, soyoli sauce
The Sal Staples
If it ain’t broke then don’t fix it. And we never will.
Served with your choice of fries, mash, salad, or soup.
Add coleslaw or gravy to any meal for $1.75
Gluten FreeFish N Chips $20
English style or corn fried – served with fries, slaw, lemon, tartar
Jumbo Shrimp $20
eight large & breaded – with fries, slaw, lemon, cocktail sauce
Hot Sandwich $15 / $17.5
hand sliced turkey or seasoned sliced beef with our famous house made gravy, on your choice of bread
Sal faveThe Burger Nip! $17.5
topped your way; drenched with our house made gravy
Gluten FreeLiver N Onions $20.5
seasoned liver steak – served with bacon and sautéed onions
Chicken Fingers $18.5
five large breaded tenders served with plum sauce
Classic Greens
Eatin’ on the lighter side – add chicken $5
Sal faveGreek – $9.5 / $14
veggies, feta, kalamata olives, oregano, house dressing
Caesar – $9.5 / $14
parmesan, croutons, house dressing
Garden – $9.5 / $14
veggies, shredded cheese, dressing of your choice
Specialty Salads
More imaginative greens
Taco Salad – $21
with chicken or shrimp, fresh pico, cheese, chipotle, sour cream, corn chips
Big Mac Salad – $21
seasoned chicken or chopped burger patty, cheese, pickles, onions, tomatoes, sesame, thousand island dressing, corn chips

Sandwiches
Classic diner sandies for your upper-class palate
Served with your choice of fries, mash, salad, or soup.
Add coleslaw or gravy to any meal for $1.75
Reuben $18.5
corned beef, Swiss, with sauerkraut – on grilled rye
Monte Cristo $18.5
turkey, ham, Swiss, cheddar, grilled in an egg batter – on white
Sal faveClubhouse $20
toasted, turkey, ham, bacon, cheddar, mozza, tomato, lettuce, mayo – on choice of bread
Loaded Grill Cheese $17
bacon, cheddar, swiss, crushed mozza sticks, garlic aioli – on choice of bread
Kinda hotChorizo Melt $18
grilled chorizo, Monterey jack, cheddar, mozza, pepers, onions – on warm hoagie
Classic BLT $14
bacon, lettuce, tomato, mayo on choice of bread – Add cheese $1.50 – Add chicken $5

Chicken
Cut, pounded and breaded the old school way
Served with your choice of fries, mash, salad, or soup.
Add coleslaw or gravy to any meal for $1.75
Southwest Sandy $19
seasoned grilled chicken, peppers, onions, cheese, sour cream, corn chips, chipotle – on a warmed hoagie
Kinda hotMaple Chicken Chipotle $19
grilled or crispy, cheddar, Canadian maple syrup, chipotle, lettuce, pickles, crispy banana peppers
The Bad Birdy $19.5
crispy chicken, bacon, swiss, coleslaw, onion rings, bold BBQ sauce, pickles
Wraps
Thick pita style wraps served in foil
Served with your choice of fries, mash, salad, or soup.
Add coleslaw or gravy to any meal for $1.75; No side? $5 Off
Sal faveGyro $18.5
beef/lamb blend, tzatziki, oregano, red onion, tomato, lettuce
Julius Caesar $19
grilled or crispy chicken, parmesan, bacon bits, lettuce, house made Caesar dressing
Spanish Sante Fe $19
grilled chorizo, one egg, waffle fries, mushrooms, crispy banana peppers, cheese, sour cream
SIDE UPGRADES: SWEET POTATOES, ONION RINGS, POUTINE $3.5
Breakfast
Did you know? The Sal; or Salsbury Grill, did not start serving breakfast until then owner Chef Peter started in 2007. Today the Sal has a loyal A.M. following and is a weekend brunch “go to” in town. We buy our bread, eggs, and potatoes locally, and we strive to do as much as we can locally, and in-house.
Classics
Can’t go wrong with the originals.
1/2/3 Egger $12/$14.5/$17
done your way – with choice of meat, toast, with a side
Sal faveBreakfast Poutine $17
home fries topped with cheese, gravy, two eggs, bacon bits, chipotle, and chives
Sal Choice $16.5
two eggs done your way, choice of two meats, toast, with a side
French Toast $14
3 slices, grilled cinnamon raisin loaf drenched in egg batter, with powdered sugar. Add meat for $3.5
Bigger Eaters
Eat like you mean it.
The Hangover $20
3 eggs, 2 meats, 2 french toast or choice of toast, with a side
Corned Beef Hash $18
with 2 eggs, cheese, onions, peppers, home fries, chives, parsley
Sal faveBig Country $20
2 eggs, bacon AND sausage AND ham, toast, with a side
Omelettes
Served French style. Plated with your choice of toast, and side
2 eggs per omelette; Add an extra for $3
Western $17
ham, peppers, onion, tomato, cheese
Sal faveMexican $17.5
bacon, fresh pico, cheese, chipotle
Veggie $15
tomato, onion, peppers, cheese
Sal faveGreek $17.5
beef/lamb, tomato, onion, peppers, feta, tzatziki, oregano
CANADIAN $18
Bacon, ham, mushrooms, maple syrup, cheese, chives bits OR diced ham n cheese
Meat n cheese $15
Bacon bits OR diced ham n’ cheese
MEAT N MUSHROOM $15.5
Bacon bits OR diced ham with sautee mushrooms n’ cheese
Handhelds
Fingers before forks.
Substitute home fries for tomato or apple slices; Gluten Free toast is available $1
Breaky Tacos $12/$17.5
one / two eggs, ham OR bacon, fresh pico, chipotle – with a side
Denver $14
ham, peppers, tomato, onion, egg, on toast – with side
Add Cheese $1, loaded for $2
Sunrise SandY $13.5
egg, meat, cheese, on choice of bread – with a side
Sal faveWestfort Wonder $17.5
egg, bacon, ham, cheddar, Swiss, melted into egg battered white bread. Served with maple syrup – with a side
KIDS $9.5
Comes with a drink and a cookie for later! (or now)
1 egg, toast, home fries
2 pieces french toast
cheese omelette & Toast
Grill Cheese, Home fries
Extras
Toast (White, Wheat, Rye) $3
Meat(Bacon, Ham, Sausage) $4.5
Home Fries, Tomatoe slices $3.5
Single Egg your way $3.5
Kids Meals
All meals are accompanied with a small drink, small dessert and fries or apple slices.
Kids 10 and under. Side substitutions available.
Chicken Fingers (3)
Hamburger
Fish n’ Chips
Grilled Cheese
